      • newTemporalLoss

        public void newTemporalLoss(java.lang.String recipient,
                            long startTime,
                            long duration,
                            double lossPercentage)
        Parameters:
        recipient - The receiving robot which will not receive messages
        startTime - The time at which to begin lossy transmissions (in system milliseconds)
        duration - The length of the lossy transmission period (in system milliseconds)
        lossPercentage - The percentage of messages to drop during lossy transmission (0.0 to 1.0)
